question: in the honour of which god is anant chaturdashi celebrated
vanilla_rag_result: Anant Chaturdashi is celebrated in honor of Lord Ganesha, as it marks the end of the Ganesh festival and involves bidding farewell to Ganesha by immersing his idols in water. Additionally, it also involves the worship of Ananta, the coiled snake on which Lord Vishnu resides.
